entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
